amendment.description: Amendment requires the Federal Communications Commission to submit to Congress within 30 days a plan for how the Commission will evaluate and address problems with the collection on Form 477 of data regarding the deployment of broadband Internet access service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 116-37 to require the Federal Communications Commission to submit to Congress within 30 days a plan for how the Commission will evaluate and address problems with the collection on Form 477 of data regarding the deployment of broadband Internet access service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wexton amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 376 - 46 (Roll no. 164).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Wexton.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wexton amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 376 - 46 (Roll no. 164).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
